item.description:
Hopefully soon the weather will improve and we will be having regular Meetups. In the meantime I would like to encourage anyone who is interested to sign up on a group list I will put together so that you can contact other members for additional play.
If you are interested, please send me the following information at sbmooser@aol.com:

First name
Contact email
Home town
Best available time(s) to play: d=day; e=evening; w=weekend and
Level of play. Based on who has come out the last couple years I would propose the following guide:

B (beginner) 2.5 - 3.0
I (intermediate) 3.0 - 3.5
A (advanced) 3.5 - 4.0
C (competitive) 4.0+

Get me your information by the end of March and I will circulate the list to the membership. Take care, Steve

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: Planning for Better Weather
